days.title: Day 1: Welcome to El Nido!
days.learning_objective: Master practical Filipino phrases for Day 1 travel scenarios
days.story_guidance: Create an engaging story that incorporates the Day 1 vocabulary and collocations in realistic El Nido travel contexts.

days.title: Day 2: At the Hotel
collocations: Good evening po! May kwarto po ba?
presentation_phrases: Good evening po! May kwarto po ba?
days.learning_objective: Master practical Filipino phrases for Day 2 travel scenarios
days.story_guidance: Create an engaging story that incorporates the Day 2 vocabulary and collocations in realistic El Nido travel contexts.

days.title: Day 3: Breakfast and Basic Needs
collocations: Good morning! Saan po ang breakfast?
presentation_phrases: Good morning! Saan po ang breakfast?
days.learning_objective: Master practical Filipino phrases for Day 3 travel scenarios
days.story_guidance: Create an engaging story that incorporates the Day 3 vocabulary and collocations in realistic El Nido travel contexts.

days.title: Day 4: Getting Around Town
collocations: Lakad lang? Derecho lang po dito.
Malapit lang po! Kita mo na yung mga building.
presentation_phrases: Lakad lang? Derecho lang po dito.
days.learning_objective: Master practical Filipino phrases for Day 4 travel scenarios
days.story_guidance: Create an engaging story that incorporates the Day 4 vocabulary and collocations in realistic El Nido travel contexts.

days.title: Day 5: Shopping for Beach Day
collocations: Ate, meron po ba kayong sunblock?
Ay! Meron po ba kayong mas mura?
presentation_phrases: Ate, meron po ba kayong sunblock?
days.learning_objective: Master practical Filipino phrases for Day 5 travel scenarios
days.story_guidance: Create an engaging story that incorporates the Day 5 vocabulary and collocations in realistic El Nido travel contexts.

days.title: Day 6: Island Hopping Preparation
collocations: Hello po! Anong oras po dating ng boat?
presentation_phrases: Hello po! Anong oras po dating ng boat?
days.learning_objective: Master practical Filipino phrases for Day 6 travel scenarios
days.story_guidance: Create an engaging story that incorporates the Day 6 vocabulary and collocations in realistic El Nido travel contexts.

days.title: Day 7: Restaurant Confidence
collocations: Outside po. May table po ba?
days.learning_objective: Master practical Filipino phrases for Day 7 travel scenarios
days.story_guidance: Create an engaging story that incorporates the Day 7 vocabulary and collocations in realistic El Nido travel contexts.

days.title: Day 8: Departure and Farewell
days.learning_objective: Master practical Filipino phrases for Day 8 departure scenarios
days.story_guidance: Create an engaging story about departure day, checking out of hotel, getting to airport, and saying farewell, incorporating Day 8 vocabulary in realistic El Nido contexts.

learning_objective: Learn conversational Filipino for travel in El Nido
